ygData.subject: Re: Concert Hall
ygData.msgSnippet: One, I think either Hotmail is messed up, or you need to check why you re posting so many copies.  As for the rest, see my comments below: ... It definitely
ygData.messageBody:
One, I think either Hotmail is messed up, or you need to check why you're
posting so many copies. As for the rest, see my comments below:

At 08:57 AM 11/25/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: dnclukey@...
> I was looking at the list of instruments and songs from the concert
> hall, and I saw some info that concerdicted the song and instrument list
> from this site. I was wondering if any of you have tested the following
> songs and instruments, and know which site is correct.
>
>song: Denon's Desparate Dirge, Lev 43, this site says damage is
>311+(lev-43)*2 making MAX dame at Lev 50 only 325, and does not say
>anything about mana; CH says it does 275 dam and requires 800mana?

It definitely requires mana, as for damage, I think the other site may have
had it correct.

>Instrument: Mistmore battle drums: this site says +20%; CH says +25%

I believe it was verified as 20%

>Instrument: Lute of the gypsy princes: this site says no effect; CH says +5%

No effect is correct.


I'm also on Bristlebane, so look for me there...

(And for those keeping track, yes, my short-lived retirement is up... time
to revisit the realms...)

Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
